(重)女儿林慧敏出世后，白天由叶凌凌的母亲照顾，晚上放工后自己负责带孩子。婴儿时期的慧敏，很爱哭，不爱吃，老是含食物在口里，走路时容易跌倒，也不会爬楼梯。直到5岁送进幼儿园上一年级的时候，校长发现异状，建议让她接受检查，结果证实慧敏比一般的孩子发育迟缓两年。慧敏在小学上了两年课，无法和其他孩子做朋友，在学习过程中无法跟进。这时叶凌凌的人生面对严峻考验，丈夫决定离开他们，叶凌凌决定将慧敏送入特殊学校上课。叶凌凌坚强的面对，除了细心教导，也带着慧敏积极学习游泳和参加歌咏队，携手和女儿一起面对未来的种种挑战。.

programme.title: 大厨你在家吗 ! Hey Chef! - EP 13

Then the challenge will be on the chefs to see how they can make use of whatever ingredients inside the refrigerators to whip up a simple yet delicious meal within 20 minutes. (重)大厨在酒店餐馆指挥若定，率领团队烹煮一道道的山珍海味，但是听说他们因为工作太忙碌了，在家都几乎不下厨！那他们off day 又会做什么呢？这个全新的大厨烹饪节目以此为出发点，每集由其中两位主持人趁大厨off day，到他们的家进行突击，看看他们在毫无准备的情况下如何临危不乱，巧用家里有限的食材，即兴煮出一桌简单又美味的家常菜！.

programme.title: 周六影院: 荡寇风云 Saturday Cinema: God Of War
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty during the reign of Emperor Jiajing, Japanese pirates regularly threaten the eastern coast of the Chinese empire. 国记交意所 It's A Small World - EP 3

programme.title: 名人。心货 Celeb's Curated Collections - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Priscelia Chan donates her valuable handmade artwork which she has kept for 16 years. Renowned fashion designer Max Tan donates motivational books which have inspired him and clothes that he designed. Annie donates her precious wine glasses. Cheryl Wee donates very practical items. It's the thought that counts that is of more importance. (重)曾诗梅将收了16年的手工艺品割爱；扬名国际的服装设计师Max捐出曾经启发他心灵的励志书籍，还有他自己品牌的服装；服装师Annie把最心爱的水晶酒杯割舍；黄馨慧虽是富二代，但不盲从名牌，捐的非常实在。有心的给予，远远胜于价值。.

(重)新传媒首部超过百集的电视剧，也是去年红星大奖大赢家，囊括最佳男女主角、男女配角和最高收视率电视剧。故事围绕在荷兰村卖椰浆饭的莫家、开洗衣店的林家、饮食集团恶霸杨家。他们在荷兰村成长、做生意、谈恋爱。碰到各种各样的问题，有开心、有失意、有阻难，但在亲情的力量中，一切都引刃而解。.

programme.title: 石器时代: 寻找传说中的宠物 Stoneage: The Legendary Pet S1 - EP 0009, 0010, 0011 & 0012
programme.desc: A passionate dreamer Woody, along with a baby pet dinosaur Moga, sets path to become the best pet trainer. Join Woody's journey as the action and comedy will keep your futuristic stone-age era a worthwhile adventure! 讲述梦想成为驯兽师的小男孩Woody与小宠物恐龙摩加（Moga）如何成为最佳宠物教练的冒险道路。.

programme.title: 搜密.打卡.小红点 Little Red Dot Detectives - EP 3

programme.desc: (R) Singapore, a little red dot, devoid of natural resources and sparse land, faces the difficulty of sustaining survival. However, we have come so far on this journey of nation-building. Through the ceaseless searching of survival methods, we have found ourselves economic opportunities, city building and management skills, and also food sources. (重)新加坡是一个弹丸小国，天然资源匮乏。这些年来新加坡之所以能立足于世界的大舞台，并且展露光芒，正因为新加坡多年来不断的掌握先机，不断的寻找新边际； 无论是开拓更多新食源、或是输出城市建设、改造与管理经验，新加坡都不遗余力，勇往直前。.

programme.title: 料理的秘密 Food Secrets - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) This eatery, a branch of the original claypot Bak Kut Teh, stands out amidst numerous Bak Kut Teh eateries in Klang. What's the secret behind its dish? Back home, let's go behind the scene of the Bak Kut Teh eatery that made headlines for turning away former HK Chief Executive Donald Tsang in 2006. (重)这家位于马来西亚肉骨茶发源地巴生的肉骨茶店，面对众多竞争对手，却能天天爆满，它的肉骨茶为什么这么受人爱戴？其中隐藏了什么料理的秘密？而让香港第三任特首曾荫权等了五年才吃得到的本地历史悠久的肉骨茶又到底有什么特别？.

(重)追求自己的幸福是每个人的权利！现今社会的女人是否应该摒弃"矜持"两个字才能更靠近幸福一点？节目中将探讨女人追求幸福时的禁忌，男人与女人相亲时该注意的事项；幸福那么近却又那么远，女人要怎么把握呢？.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 20
programme.desc: (R) Fengxi recalls Enhe has mentioned that Zhixu witnessed his parents' death in a fire when he was young. Together with Zhixu's weird behaviour recently, she realizes that her father has taken part in the murder of Zhixu's parents. Fengxi knows Zhixu must be very sad so she decides to ask Zhixu out and break up with him. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)在法庭旁听恩赫辩论时，奉熙联想到恩赫提起智旭年幼时曾目睹过父母火灾死亡的现场，再加上近日智旭对自己的种种怪异表现，醒悟自己的爸爸参与了杀害智旭父母的火灾事故。奉熙知道智旭一定很难过，决定约智旭出来提出分手。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 7
programme.desc: Ruli arranges with Xu Monian and Yi Jidong to escape from prison. She jumped into the river and is pronounced dead. Zhiyuan learns about Ruli's death. On the other hand, Ruli changes her identity to Yunxue. Wulie is shocked when he sees a lady resembling Ruli driving a car beside his car. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)徐末年与尹基东安排如莉逃狱计划, 让如莉跳河自杀.如莉死去的消息很快传到智媛那边，大家都觉得不可思议. 而如莉从此用尹雪的身份生活. 在路上等红绿灯时武烈意外看到尹雪，长得很像如莉便立刻追上去.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 8
programme.desc: Daozi is accused of sexual harassment and Yunxue (Ruli) comes to his aid as a lawyer. Wulie spots Yunxue and is certain that she is his ex-girlfriend, Ruli. Yunxue (Ruli) pretends not knowing him. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)道治被告性骚扰模特儿，尹雪(如莉)自愿办他决解。武烈很肯定尹雪是前女友如莉而尹雪坚称不认识武烈。.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 4
programme.desc: Aidan wants to confess his feelings for Nadia but ends up embarrassing himself. Aidan finds out that Shi Jie keeps bullying Nadia and lies to teach Shi Jie a lesson. It turns out that when Aidan was young, he also often stood up for Nadia to bullies and helped her out of situations. But Nadia has scolded him for his help and has even chased him away, exclaiming that she hates him, on several occasions. Aidan has never understood why, which is why he has taken on the name of Aidan and tries to get closer to Nadia. (PG-部分画面令人不安)Aidan想对Nadia献殷勤，结果反而出糗，尴尬不已。Aidan发现施姐一再欺负Nadia，为Nadia出气，撒谎整施姐。原来小时候的赵毅刚（Aidan），也常为被人欺负的林美玲（Nadia）出气，但林美玲总是一次又一次的轰走帮助自己的毅刚，更扬言讨厌他！毅刚百思不解，为此他决定改名Aidan，亲近Nadia。.

Shanmei agrees and the book seller becomes the new owner of the golden band. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)书贩子说可以把小善美的灵魂带走，让长大后的善美过着截然不同的人生。善美答应，灵魂瞬间被困在图书里，而书贩子则成为金刚箍的新主人。.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Aidan wants to confess his feelings for Nadia but ends up embarrassing himself. Aidan finds out that Shi Jie keeps bullying Nadia and lies to teach Shi Jie a lesson. programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Ruli arranges with Xu Monian and Yi Jidong to escape from prison. She jumped into the river and is pronounced dead. Zhiyuan learns about Ruli's death. On the other hand, Ruli changes her identity to Yunxue. Wulie is shocked when he sees a lady resembling Ruli driving a car beside his car. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)徐末年与尹基东安排如莉逃狱计划, 让如莉跳河自杀.如莉死去的消息很快传到智媛那边，大家都觉得不可思议. 而如莉从此用尹雪的身份生活. 在路上等红绿灯时武烈意外看到尹雪，长得很像如莉便立刻追上去.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Daozi is accused of sexual harassment and Yunxue (Ruli) comes to his aid as a lawyer. Wulie spots Yunxue and is certain that she is his ex-girlfriend, Ruli. Yunxue (Ruli) pretends not knowing him. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)道治被告性骚扰模特儿，尹雪(如莉)自愿办他决解。武烈很肯定尹雪是前女友如莉而尹雪坚称不认识武烈。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 2 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 2 - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) This food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. (重)美食节目介绍有特色的台湾料理，也同时披露每道菜肴背后的感人故事。.

programme.title: 求学地图 Schools Unlimited - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) The University of Oxford is one of the top dream schools for many Singaporean students. Let's learn from a Singaporean law student about her school life at the University of Oxford. Another Singaporean student from the King's College London shares about his school life and his course in War Studies. (重)英国牛津大学是许多新加坡学子希望前往留学的目标，让来自新加坡的牛津大学法律系学生告诉你她的校园生活究竟如何。 再让另一位在伦敦国王学院的新加坡留学生告诉你什么是战争学系和他的求学生活。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 64
programme.desc: (R) Xiuqing is a suitable match for Meici, but she is not advised to go through the kidney donation process as she is found out to be pregnant. Jia-en helps obtain a few strands of Xiantai's hair. Zaiyong replaces Bafeng's hair sample with Xiantai's hair for the genetic test. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)检验显示，秀卿可以捐肾给美慈，但因为秀卿怀孕了，所以不适合捐肾。佳恩帮忙拿到贤泰的头发。载永偷龙转凤，将贤泰和八峰的头发样品对调，导致基因鉴定结果显示，八峰就是金民秀。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 21
programme.desc: (R) Zaihong, a kid who learns Taekwondo with Fengxi, is taken to the police station as he witnessed a murder. Fengxi is called to the police station as Zaixiong tells the police officers that his teacher is a lawyer. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)曾与奉熙学习跆拳道的孩子载弘因目睹了一起杀人案而被带到了警察局。宰雄告诉警员自己的老师是个律师，于是奉熙便被叫到警察局。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 9
programme.desc: Haizhu tells Zhiyuan that Wulie is seeking information on Ruli. Zhiyuan ascertained Ruli's death with the prison warden. Yunxue (Ruli) helps Daozi in settling his legal suit. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)海珠告诉智媛武烈在查如莉的消息。智媛便向监狱官再确认如莉的过世。尹雪(如莉)顺利摆平道治的告状。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 10
programme.desc: Han Sula is overjoyed when Daozi takes her to meet his family members but actually, Zhiyuan is trying to arrange for Sula to get close to Daozi. Wulie wants to confirm Yunxue is Ruli by her shoulder's scar but no scar mark is found on her. She tells him off. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)一听到道治要带她去见他家人，韩素拉高兴万分。其实素拉是被智媛安排接近道治。武烈知道如莉的肩膀上有烧伤的伤疤，衣扯之后，却什么也没有。.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 8
programme.desc: Be it comfort food found in comics or the nostalgic taste of old Tokyo, the underlying spirit of these dishes are vividly personified in renowned Japanese literature. Host Youyi travels to Japan to have a taste of the dishes from classical and contemporary Japanese culture. 无论是漫画中传递温情的平凡菜肴，迎合都市快捷生活节奏的轻食，还是勾起回忆的浓浓古早味，日本历代文豪以精湛的文笔，捕捉食物的情意；借由笔墨让料理醇厚的味道持久留芳。这一集，主持人有懿透过味蕾，感受日式料理中蕴含的新旧文化。.

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 17
programme.desc: Shanmei's blood can no longer sustain Fuzi since she is not Sanzang anymore. Fuzi decomposes at an increasing speed and will soon become an evil spirit. Zhenxian says the only way to help Fuzi is to feed her live humans. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)由于三藏换成了书贩子，善美的血无法继续为富子保鲜。富子的腐烂程度越来越快，即将成为厉鬼。振贤说可以延迟富子变成厉鬼的唯一方法就是给她吃活人。.

programme.title: 烧。卖 Served H.O.T. - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Fugui set up a series of challenges to determine if Tai Long can stay. The first challenge is to cook prawn noodle soup. The second challenge is to cook Char Kuay Teow. On the day of the competition, Meiwei decided to change their approach at the last minute and use their secret weapon! (PG-些许打斗场面)(重)三个年轻人即将得到老字号南洋风味小吃店价值一百万的Laksa祖传秘方。他们是风雨同舟的兄弟：商业奇才庄浩伦（包勋评饰）、刀神陈欧文（方伟杰饰）和烹饪天才何泰龙（冯伟衷饰），合称“H.O.T”。三个前科犯准备接管生意，创造更好的生活。他们将遇到为厨师梦而孤军奋战的曾美薇（雅慧饰）、扬言破坏他们声誉的大厨Gordon（George Young饰）和破坏弟弟泰龙幸福的泰虎（李腾饰）。H.O.T之间的忠诚和成功将会因为过去的阴影而再次接受挑战。.

programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) The low social status of Indian women, low judiciary efficiency, weak law enforcement, the patriarchal social structure, male supremacy and caste system have resulted in female rape victims not able to seek justice. How can these women be rescued and reborn under this neglected and unequal system? (PG-些许性相关语)(重)印度女性社会地位低下、司法界效率低、执法力度弱、父权制社会结构、男尊女卑、种姓制度的陋习，导致印度妇女在遭受强奸侵害后，无法得到伸张正义。面对泼强酸事件，她们要如何在被忽视、不平等的制度下获救和重生？.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 65
programme.desc: (R) Xiuqing is determined to donate her kidney to Meici even if it means losing her baby. Zhenshu wants to help Xiuqing out. She goes for a test and finds out that she is also a suitable donor. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀卿看见美慈被病魔折磨的样子，不惜冒着可能失去孩子的可能性，想捐肾救美慈。真淑为了让秀卿保住孩子，自行到医院接受检查，结果发现她适合捐肾给美慈。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 22
programme.desc: (R) Zhixu is frustrated as he knows that Xianxiu is the murderer but he cannot do anything about it as a lawyer. The idea of returning to be a public prosecutor again arises in his mind. However, the thought of having to get the chief prosecutor's approval makes him hesitate. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)明明知道贤秀就是凶手而身为律师却无能为力令智旭很苦恼，于是他萌生了重新做检察官的念头。但想到要过地检长那关时，他有些犹豫了。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 11
programme.desc: Wulie keeps pestering Yunxue and tries to confirm Yunxue's real identity as she looks exactly like Ruli. Maya and Jiaya get into trouble in school for fighting with their classmate and Yunxue is the lawyer who takes on their case. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)金武烈坚信就算尹雪不承认自己是如莉，他还是有办法证明,但尹雪早已做足了准备，甚至连大学的照片也提前备好，金武烈这才相信尹雪不是如莉。嘉亚与玛亚在学校与同学打架，尹雪竟然是负责此事律师。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 12
programme.desc: Yunxue brings the drunken Wulie to his house and intentionally rings the doorbell to let Haizhu sees her face. Her aim is to induce their marriage breakdown. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)金武烈喝得醉醺醺,尹雪将他送回家，到家门口时海珠打来电话，尹雪故意接通视频电话让海珠看到自己。目的是让他们两婚姻破裂。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 2
programme.desc: In the Philippines, 3 babies are born per minute. Manila is now the world's most densely populated city and home to a 'baby factory hospital'. Joanna Dong enters the delivery wards to uncover unsettling issues - high teenage pregnancy rates and poor families burdened by too many mouths to feed. 在菲律宾每三分钟就有一名宝宝诞生。首都马尼拉目前已是全球人口最稠密的城市，政府妇幼医院更成为举世闻名的“婴孩工厂”。董姿彦发现，不节育、孩子生得过多，不但加重了医疗资源短缺，也延续了贫困的恶性循环。.

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 18
programme.desc: Fuzi knows her days on the mortal world are numbered. She does not want to turn into an evil spirit and thus requests for Wukong to eliminate her when she is ready. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)富子知道自己始终是僵尸，不能留在人间。富子不想成为厉鬼，于是要求悟空在她最美的时候把她烧了。.

programme.title: 离家。出走 Greener Pastures - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Today, there are more than 20 million refugees worldwide who are forced to seek temporary shelter in different countries. In Malaysia alone, there are more than 90,000 refugees living in Selangor and Kuala Lumpur. Life is hard, despite their best efforts to eke out an existence in a foreign land. (重)由于战乱和冲突，每天有将近3万人逃离家园，沦为难民。如今，全球共有超过两千万难民。他们被迫在不同的国境中漂泊、离散，无处安身。在马来西亚，仅仅在雪兰莪和吉隆坡地区，就有超过9万名难民。他们在离家很远的地方，用加倍的努力，去抵御生活中的百般滋味。.

programme.title: 探索食材 The Food Detectives 3 - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) The new season of "The Food Detectives" continues the culinary exploration of the foods we eat and more. Host Nikki Muller, will debunk the myths, delve into the unknowns and provide useful information to help us make informed choices for the meals we enjoy and how they fit into our lifestyles. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 寂寞鱼•听见 A Lonely Fish - EP 6
programme.desc: Jing Xuan suspects Tim is the mastermind behind the car accident and confronts him with the group photograph and cassette tape that she found. Tim denies that he has anything to do with the accident, he tells Jing Xuan that there might not be any mastermind. Jing Xuan is confused as she does not know if she should believe Tim. Kora explains to Jing Xuan that she treats Yi Kai like a brother and she will never let Jing Xuan down, the two good friends reconcile and look for Jing Xuan's classmate Jian Yu, who is editing their short film. Kora accidentally finds out that Jian Yu had been stalking Jing Xuan and taking photos of her secretly. Jing Xuan found out that Ann's assistant was following Hao Cheng and her from these photos. Jing Xuan suspects Ann is associated with the car accident. Jing Xuan confronts Ann about the car accident. Ann brings Jing Xuan back to the scene of the accident and says, if Jing Xuan wants to know the truth, she will have to pay a heavy price, including losing (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(大结局)静萱拿着父母、Tim和Ann四人的合照和卡带去找Tim。她怀疑Tim是策划车祸的幕后黑手。Tim告诉静萱自己没有设计那场车祸，也许车祸根本就没有幕后黑手。静萱不知道该不该相信Tim。Kora向静萱解释自己与亦凯的感觉后，两人和好如初。两人一起去找建宇，看他剪辑的片段。Kora意外发现建宇一直都在偷拍静萱。静萱从建宇的偷拍照片中发现了Ann的助理曾经跟踪过她和浩成，静萱怀疑Ann与车祸有关。静萱去找Ann问清真相。Ann带静萱回到车祸现场，告诉静萱如果她要知道车祸的真相，她就要付出很大的代价，静萱将失去现在所拥有的一切，包括她的甜蜜爱情。时亦凯出现，在旁劝静萱不要为了寻找真相，而失去他们之间的感情。静萱十分挣扎，她真的很想知道车祸背后的真相，想为爸妈讨回公道。在爱情和真相之间，静萱选择了…….

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 66
programme.desc: (R) Meici is in a critical condition when her kidneys fail completely. Zhenshu agrees to donate her kidney immediately. Meici regains consciousness not long after the operation, but Zhenshu remains unconscious for days. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)美慈的肾脏完全失去功能，毒素扩散到身体的其他部分，医生建议立刻动手术。真淑答应。手术过后，美慈苏醒，但真淑却久久没有醒来。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 23
programme.desc: (R) Xianxiu manages to escape from the hospital after injuring Youjing and the police officer guarding his ward. programme.desc: Seeking social status equality is the women's goal in Iran as feminism is forcibly discredited in the society. programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 77
programme.desc: Ep 67: Bafeng transfers his shares to Fengyao Company. The major shareholders vote for Yinghao to be replaced from his position. Ep 67: 丰耀公司召开理事会，再次要求英鎬卸任。八峰把股份转让给丰耀公司，导致丰耀得到经营权，成功影响理事们。英鎬被解聘。载永突然出现在理事会，宣布其实他就是丰耀公司的代表。英鎬被载永背叛，大受打击。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 2 Sound Of My Dream 2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Produced by the same people behind Sing!, Sound of My Dream boasts 5 top-notch mentors, (Sandy Lam, JJ Lin, Yu Quan Group, Jane Zhang), impressive sets and production, and a very unique contest format. The contest witnesses the challenges and preparation each mentor puts into their performances as they prove their worth. And it features stellar performances from mentors and amateurs alike. 本季四组常驻导师为羽泉、林忆莲、林俊杰和张靓颖，主持人为华少。另从本季开始新设立客座导师一位，称之为“神秘导师”，每期更换。第二季在选歌方式与上季不同，选歌、定歌都在录影前，练歌则是在录影前6小时之内完成（上季只有3小时，这季增加音樂導師练歌时间）；6小时后在舞台将直接接受追梦歌手讨教。.

programme.title: Wasabi 新体验 Find The Wasabi 2 - EP 7
programme.desc: "Find the Wasabi 2" is a 'reality-game travelogue' series featuring 3 Asian celebrities who are on a special mission to find the 'secret spice' of Japan... In each episode, the Hunters are challenged by a powerful "Commander" to solve 'mysteries' about Japan that puzzle people around the world. (重)WASABI新体验第二季再出击，徐鸣杰将与来自泰国及马来西亚的朋友在日本学习当忍者，通过不同的任务竞赛，探索不为人知的日本文化，带给你潮流、美食、旅游等第一手资料，发现日本新魅力！这一系列的Wasabi主持人是性感女神藤原纪香。.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 4
programme.desc: Aidan wants to confess his feelings for Nadia but ends up embarrassing himself. Aidan finds out that Shi Jie keeps bullying Nadia and lies to teach Shi Jie a lesson. It turns out that when Aidan was young, he also often stood up for Nadia to bullies and helped her out of situations. But Nadia has scolded him for his help and has even chased him away, exclaiming that she hates him, on several occasions. Aidan has never understood why, Aidan想对Nadia献殷勤，结果反而出糗，尴尬不已。Aidan发现施姐一再欺负Nadia，为Nadia出气，撒谎整施姐。原来小时候的赵毅刚（Aidan），也常为被人欺负的林美玲（Nadia）出气，但林美玲总是一次又一次的轰走帮助自己的毅刚，更扬言讨厌他！毅刚百思不解，为此他决定改名Aidan，亲近Nadia。.

programme.title: 爷爷的路 My Grandfather's Road - EP 3
programme.desc: My Grandfather's Road aims to uncover even more roads in Singapore named after notable founding fathers and pioneers through their descendants. Through in-depth interviews, archive footages and show and tells, we will learn more about the country's past as well as the people who helped make Singapore the success that it is today. (重)《爷爷的路》的目的是发现更多以开国元勋和先锋而命名的马路。通过深入采访他们的子孙后裔、录像档案、演出和口述，让我们对国家的历史以及建国功臣们有更加深入的了解。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 35
programme.desc: Ep 35: Shimei and Shihao's father suddenly appears to demand for the income they received for appearing in the advertisement. He turns violent when Shimei and Shihao refuse to give him the money. Haixiu is knocked unconscious when she tries to protect Yuzhen from being beaten by Shimei's father. Ep 35: 世美和世浩的父亲突然出现，表面上是要与他们团聚，实际上是觊觎他们的广告费。世美和世浩不肯给父亲钱，父亲大声吵闹，还对劝架的宇真挥拳。海秀为了保护宇真，自己被撞晕。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 36
programme.desc: Ep 36: Guixi says she does not agree to the relationship between Yuzhen and Yiyuan as Wancai is just a security guard. Wancai retaliates by saying that he also does not want to have anything to do with Guixi as she is rude and snobbish. Ep 36: 贵熙说ONE’s食品的职员们都知道万才是公司大楼的警卫，非常丢脸，没办法跟郑家做亲家。万才指贵熙对他的家人无礼，又拿钱伤害他们，令他也一样不想跟高家做亲家。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 24
programme.desc: Ep 31Noticing Zuodou's expression when he is fixing Enzhao's gayageum, Shengzhu realizes that Zuodou prefers to return to the countryside to make gayageum. She suggests to Zuodou to return to the countryside as she worries Zuodou will not be happy in Seoul. She proposes they can maintain a long distance courtship, with face to face meetings twice a week and calls twice daily. However, Shengzhu is too busy and often cannot fulfill the commitment. This disappoints Zuodou many times.Ep 32Shen Ep 31胜珠见作斗替恩照修琴的表情，知道他还是喜欢回乡下做琴。因担心他为了自己留在首尔会不幸福，于是胜珠提议让作斗回乡下，和自己远距离恋爱，两人每周见面一次，每天打电话两次。但胜珠因工作太忙，常常无法照做，让作斗失望多次。Ep 32好友们知胜珠决定到乡下和作斗生活，都觉得她很有勇气。作斗知胜珠在首尔工作辛苦。他向胜珠告白，俩人决定结婚。他们在乡下办了一场温馨的婚礼，众好友们都来参加了。胜珠的母亲和弟弟见到胜珠开心的表情，知道她很幸福。.

programme.title: 美食世家 2 Food Empire 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Breakfast is, surely, the most important meal of the day. And Singapore has an inexhaustible list of breakfast items for early risers! Episode One hunts down 3 local favourites to kickstart the day! Let's rouse over butter cakes dunked in steaming coffee, scrumptious nasi lemak and flying pratas!

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 8
programme.desc: Be it comfort food found in comics or the nostalgic taste of old Tokyo, the underlying spirit of these dishes are vividly personified in renowned Japanese literature. Host Youyi travels to Japan to have a taste of the dishes from classical and contemporary Japanese culture. 无论是漫画中传递温情的平凡菜肴，迎合都市快捷生活节奏的轻食，还是勾起回忆的浓浓古早味，日本历代文豪以精湛的文笔，捕捉食物的情意；借由笔墨让料理醇厚的味道持久留芳。这一集，主持人有懿透过味蕾，感受日式料理中蕴含的新旧文化。.

programme.title: 寻找原之味 Food Old Days - EP 10
programme.desc: Singapore is heralded as the Food Paradise and Singaporeans' favourite pastime includes searching out for the best hawker and local cuisines in every corner on the island. However, many traditional food fares are now on the brink of vanishing. Many of these stall owners are either old or retiring and found no one to succeed their businesses even though they may be thriving. (重)新加坡号称美食天堂，新加坡人最喜爱的休闲活动之一就是全岛搜寻最好吃的熟食档、到全岛各角落品尝本地美食。然而，随着时代进步、空间变迁，许多传统美食因为后继无人而渐渐消失，许多传统做法因为科技而渐渐失传。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 2
programme.desc: In the Philippines, 3 babies are born per minute. Manila is now the world's most densely populated city and home to a 'baby factory hospital'. Joanna Dong enters the delivery wards to uncover unsettling issues - high teenage pregnancy rates and poor families burdened by too many mouths to feed. 在菲律宾每三分钟就有一名宝宝诞生。首都马尼拉目前已是全球人口最稠密的城市，政府妇幼医院更成为举世闻名的“婴孩工厂”。董姿彦发现，不节育、孩子生得过多，不但加重了医疗资源短缺，也延续了贫困的恶性循环。.

programme.desc: A music variety where a number of talented singers, amateur or otherwise are given the chance to "challenge" a celebrity tutor by singing one of the celebrity's songs. programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 1
programme.desc: Ailin is the mother of a pair of twins. She is normally busy taking care of her mischievous son and daughter. Jin Ben quickly shakes them off .While handling her husband's funeral arrangements, Ailin receives a call from her neighbour informing her that her twins have disappeared. She is in panics. 金本到灵堂去调查国家保安室室长文成洙的死因时，不慎被国家情报院次长权英实发现了踪迹。权英实认出来金本就是代号为“陶斯”的前特工后命人,即刻加以追捕。金本遭到追踪，迅速逃跑。正当爱麟在办老公的后事时，接到邻居来电告知双胞胎失踪的消息，不禁陷入了恐慌之中。.
